name: AspenHome
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Please follow the steps below to connect Alexa to your Aspen Home products:
(1) Download our AspenHome app in Android or IOS app market
(2) Register AspenHome account in our app
(3) Aspen smart home device(s) must be nearby in order to connect
(4) Configure your smart device with our AspenHome app and set a name
(5) Log into Amazon Alexa app
(6) Tap the menu button located at the upper left corner and select “Skills & Games”
(7) Enter “Aspen Home” in the search bar, then select “Aspen Home” 
(8) Select “Enable to Use”, you will then be navigated to AspenHome login page
(9) Follow the instructions on the page to complete linking
(10) Once authorized, select “DISCOVER DEVICES” in Alexa app to find your AspenHome device(s)
(11) If you want to change your smart device name, go back to step (4). 

Please note that if you need to add more devises in the future, you will need to Discover Devices again. 

Now that the setup is finished, you can use voice commands like the ones below to control your Aspen Smart Devices: 

“Alexa, turn on Window Fan"
“Alexa, turn off Window Fan”

“Alexa, set Window Fan speed to 3"
“Alexa, set Window Fan speed to 2"
“Alexa, set Window Fan speed to 1"

If you have any questions or concerns with the skill function, feel free to contact us by email: service@theaspen.com
